summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 28474, insofar as it relates to the Department of Buildings, entitled "An Ordinance relating to and naming the positions of the officers and employees of various departments of the city government of the City of Seattle, creating certain positions and authorizing the appointment of employees to fill such positions, fixing the salaries therefor and repealing all ordinances in conflict," approved November 29, 1911.
